isis.stitle: CAB: DAYCAB AND SLEEPER CAB for ProStar, ProStar Premium, and ProStar Limited Models - INSTALL - CAB DOORS

svcsubproc.title: Install Cab Door on Daycab and Sleeper Cab
svcsubproc.para: Doors are of all steel-welded construction. The front cab door is mounted on hinges located on the cab door hinge pillar and door adjustment is provided by enlarged holes in cab door hinge. Door check stop is located just below upper hinge on the cab door hinge pillar. Cab door latch striker pin is also adjustable on cab door lock pillar. Service on the door and its components are covered in sections which follow.

Refer to Figure 28
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Use a sling or padded chain through top of window opening and attach sling to an overhead hoist to support cab door. Move cab door (Item 6) from a padded work bench or other suitable support covered with a material that protected painted surfaces of the door.

Once the cab door (Item 6) is positioned at the cab. Carefully install the wiring harness and connectors of cab door through cab door hinge pillar into the cab and pull them through as far as they will go, as the cab door is placed on the hinges.

Once the wiring harness and connectors are installed into the cab. Slide four threaded studs (Item 5) of cab door (Item 6) into mounting holes of upper and lower cab door hinges (Items 7 and 8), driver side shown.
Install four hex nuts with washers (Item 4) onto threaded studs (Item 5) of cab door (Item 6), driver side shown. Tighten to 14 to 18 Lbf-ft (19.6 to 24 N•m).
Position cab door check link (Item 2) into cab door check bracket (Item 3). Install cab door check stop pin (Item 1), driver side shown.

svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 27
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Once the cab door is installed onto the cab. Reach up under the instrument panel to the left of the steering wheel and connect CB radio cable connector (Item 1), electric window and electric door lock wiring harness connector (Item 2) and lighted, heated or electric mirror wiring harness connector (Item 3), if so equipped, driver side shown.

svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 26
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Reach up under the instrument panel and push the cab door wiring harness (Item 1) and connectors (Item 2) up under the instrument panel, driver side shown.

svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 25
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Install door wiring harness rubber boot (Item 1) onto the cab hinge pillar (Item 2), driver side shown.
Repeat procedure to install passenger side front cab door.
